contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of November, 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted and the parties are directed to address the following issue:
Whether 34 Pa.C.S. § 901(a)(2) is unconstitutional because Article I, Section 8 of the Pennsylvania Constitution provides a landowner with a reasonable expectation of privacy in his posted property.
